attributes.action: Give nhs staff tax breaks for life
attributes.additional_details: Mps award themselves generous pay rises and the most brave have had nothing in real terms for years they are over worked underfunded and until now undervalued all nhs staff are heros
attributes.background: NHS staff for years have had in real terms no real pay rises now in OUR hour of need we need them more than ever I say thank them for their hard work a bravery give them generous tax breaks infact never pay tax again we owe them everything.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
